item.title: crontab -e as root vs sudo crontab -e [solved]
item.description: 21:10 Monday 21 January 2019 JST I had a weird issue with crontab today. If I editted the crontab while logged in as root, it did not work. $# whoami root $# crontab -e ((( make edits ))) crontab: installing new crontab But the changes did not work. $# exit $ whoami ubuntu sudo crontab -e ((( make edits ))) crontab: installing new crontab And the changes work just fine.
